description: Describes a dataset group created using the CreateDatasetGroup operation. In addition to listing the parameters provided in the CreateDatasetGroup request, this operation includes the following properties:

parameters.name: DatasetGroupArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: DatasetGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: DatasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: DatasetArns
nested_items.description: An array of Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the datasets contained in the dataset group.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the dataset group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset group. States include:

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the dataset group was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: When the dataset group was created or last updated from a call to the UpdateDatasetGroup operation. While the dataset group is being updated, LastModificationTime is the current time of the DescribeDatasetGroup call.
